title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When code assist is triggered, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes are made. However, code assist does not appear as expected.
OB: The file is incorrectly marked as dirtied even though no changes are made, and code assist does not appear.
EB: Code assist should only dirty the file if actual changes are made. If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR: Update the code assist functionality to only dirty the file when actual changes are made. Additionally, ensure that code assist is triggered and displayed correctly when needed.
